item.title: When and How to Stream the Stars of the Open Charity Game with Coco Gauff, John McEnroe, Venus Williams and More Grand Slam Champs
item.description: The 2025 U.S. Open will feature a star-studded doubles match to benefit the USTA Foundation — here’s how to watch online for free.
